law.catch_line: In addition to the powers set forth elsewhere in this title, the Board may:...

text.section:
The Board may not require a facility or a dentist to obtain a permit if a dentist:
Administers nitrous oxide that is not administered in conjunction with:
Another method of diminishing or eliminating pain; or
Medication used for diminishing or eliminating anxiety; or
Prescribes or administers oral medication to a patient within the maximum recommended dosage for that patient for the sole purpose of diminishing or eliminating anxiety that is not prescribed in conjunction with:
Another method of diminishing or eliminating pain; or
The administration of nitrous oxide.

In addition to the duties set forth elsewhere in this title, the Board shall:
Keep a record of each license and each action taken under § 4-315 of this title;
Have an official seal; and
Adopt rules, regulations, and bylaws as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this title.
